properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Majestic sweetness sits enthroned Upon the Savior’s brow; His head with radiant glories crowned, His lips with grace o’erflow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: No mortal can with Him compare Among the sons of men; Fairer is He than all the fair That fill the heavenly train.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: To Him I owe my life and breath, And all the joys I have; He makes me triumph over death, And saves me from the grave.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: To God, the Father, my abode, He brings my weary feet; Shows me the glories of my God, And makes my joys complete.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Since from His bounty I receive Such proofs of love divine, Had I a thousand hearts to give, Lord, they should all be Thine.
